notifications.title: New Version 1.0.10.0 - Update Coming Soon!
notifications.message: Updates will include: Minor performance updates, better app notifications. Be on the look out for Version 1.1.0.0 coming soon!

notifications.title: We Welcome Feeback
notifications.message: Program feedback and feature requests can be sent through the Submit Ticket link in the Knowledge Base or throught the Email in the Help/About tab!
